How did I make this website?

How was it possible?

It was because of code club. I would have never been able to this website or any of these things without code club (CHECK THEM OUT):

Project 1: Birthday card for a friend.

Project 2: Anna and Fern's joke book!

Project 3: Robot on the loose poster.

Project 4: Smoothie.

Project 5: Secret message

Project 6: Term one showcase

In code club it is really fun, I learn new things every week. I hope you enjoyed having a look at this website and you can come back any time to get any more tips, hints and advice of any of these 3 fantastic projects. Thank you for looking at this website and I hope you will come back soon.
